mapper.select: select * from room where place_num = #{num} and num not in (select distinct num from room r, reserved rsv where r.place_num = #{num} and rsv.room_num = r.num and rdate between to_date(#{startdate},'mm-dd-yyyy') and to_date(#{enddate},'mm-dd-yyyy')-1) order by price,num
mapper.insert: insert into booking(num, member_id, place_num, room_num, startdate, enddate, cname) values(booking_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{place_num}, #{room_num}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{cname})

declare start_date varchar2(8) end_date varchar2(8) begin start_date := to_number(to_char(to_date('20220825', 'yyyyMMdd'), 'j')) end_date := to_number(to_char(to_date('20220830', 'yyyyMMdd'), 'j')) for a in start_date..end_date loop insert into reserved(room_num, rdate) values(27, to_char(to_date(a, 'j'), 'yyyyMMdd')) end loop end
